description:
The complete fallout of the events at Kokujo Island come to light and brings about farewells nobody thought they`d ever see.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Arc de l`adieu au Shinsengumi 9: Adieu, Shinsengumi
Farewell Shinsengumi Arc Part Nine: Farewell Shinsengumi
Saraba Shinsengumi Hen Kyuu: Saraba Shinsengumi
さらば真選組篇九 さらば真選組
